mean_en: pleasure that you have when you recognize and enjoy the good qualities of somebody/something; a piece of writing or a speech in which the strengths and weaknesses of somebody/something, especially an artist or a work of art, are discussed and judged
sentence: Appreciation of art is a skill that needs to be nurtured.
sentence_trans: 艺术鉴赏是一种需要培养的技能。
word_etyma: ap一再 + preci价值 + ation名词后缀，表示行为 → 一再估价 → 评价，鉴赏，欣赏
